channel.title: Risk assessment on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Risk assessment on FinanClub

item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:-74 Chances: Palantir stock is red-hot following its blowout fourth-quarter earnings earlier this month. By now the AI revolution is no secret to Wall Street. The size of the AI market could exceed $1 trillion in the coming years. Palantir says its new Artificial Intelligence Platform is helping it gain new customers.

item.title: CAH
item.description: score:-141 Chances: Cardinal Health’s acquisition of Specialty Networks for $1.2 billion shows its commitment to investing in the specialty pharmacy business, which is a positive sign for potential growth and expansion. The company’s strong performance in the Pharmaceutical segment in the second-quarter fiscal 2024 indicates stability and potential for continued growth.
